summary: This is a service request ticket from the Federal Bureau of Prisons (FBOP) Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, reporting severe video lagging when viewing multiple IP cameras from the Control Application. The request was created on October 3, 2019, and scheduled for service between 8-11am that day.

events.title: Service Request for Camera Lagging
events.description: A service request (#25765) was created for the FBOP MCC New York due to severe video lagging occurring when viewing multiple IP cameras from the Control Application.

locations: FBOP MCC New York MS0109 (130104.001), NEW YORK, NY 10007
keyFacts: A service request was filed on October 3, 2019, for technical issues with the surveillance camera system at the Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The specific problem was severe video lagging when viewing multiple IP cameras from the Control Application.
The service was scheduled to be addressed on the same day it was reported, between 8-11am on October 3, 2019.
The document is a routine maintenance/service ticket and does not contain information about individuals, events, or connections related to the Epstein case.
